PackagePushError.name: PackagePushError
PackagePushError.description: Represents an error encountered during a push request. The number of PackagePushError records created depends on the number of push jobs in the request that result in an error.

ErrorMessage.description: The error code that appears in the API.

ErrorTitle.description: The error message title that appears in the API.

ErrorType.description: Valid values are: ApexTestFailure DeployError FeatureMissing IneligibleUpgrade LimitExceeded LockingFailure PACError UnclassifiedError

PackagePushJobId.description: Required. The parent push job record ID.
